  "Well I see Unicron didnt teach you any manners with your upgrade.  I have 
heard your voice before. Werent you suppose to kill the bot known as drill 
bit and failed?" He say down in the process he transformed into his robot 
mode. The liquid form of proto came   up for a second but he was then  in 
robot mode. "So what are our plans for the future?"
